# 사람 얼굴인식 {#recognize-face}


```{r face-recognition}
devtools::install_github("bnosac/image",
                         subdir = "image.dlib",
                         build_vignettes = TRUE)

devtools::install_github("bnosac/image",
                         subdir = "image.libfacedetection",
                         build_vignettes = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(magick)
library(image.libfacedetection)


```
